00097 
00098 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointInSegment(double position) const
00099 {
00100        return ((m_a * position + m_b) * position + m_c) * position + m_d;
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationInSegment(double position) const
00105 {
00106        return (m_a * (3 * position) + m_b * 2) * position + m_c;
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationBegin() const
00111 {
00112        return m_c;
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationEnd() const
00117 {
00118        return m_a * 3 + m_b * 2 + m_c;
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointBegin() const
00123 {
00124        return m_d;
00125 }
00126 
00127 
00128 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointEnd() const
00129 {
00130        return m_a + m_b + m_c + m_d;
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetBezierPointBegin() const
00135 {
00136        return m_d + m_c / 3;
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetBezierPointEnd() const
00141 {
00142        return m_c + m_d + (m_b - m_c) / 3;
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 inline void CSplineSegment::GetHalfSegmentFirst(CSplineSegment& result) const
00147 {
00148        result.m_a = m_a * 0.125;
00149        result.m_b = m_b * 0.25;
00150        result.m_c = m_c * 0.5;
00151        result.m_d = m_d;
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 inline void CSplineSegment::GetHalfSegmentSecond(CSplineSegment& result) const
00156 {
00157        result.m_a = m_a * 0.125;
00158        result.m_b = m_a * 0.375 + m_b * 0.25;
00159        result.m_c = m_a * 0.375 + (m_b + m_c) * 0.5;
00160        result.m_d = m_a * 0.125 + m_b * 0.25 + m_c * 0.5 + m_d;
00161 }
00162
